heroSection.title: Free Planning Poker App
heroSection.description: Free / Open source Planning Poker Web App to estimate user stories for your Agile/Scrum teams. Create a session and invite your team members to estimate user stories efficiently.

GameController.areYouSureDelete: Are you sure? This will delete this session and remove all players.

CardPicker.ClickOnTheCardToVote: Click on the card to vote
CardPicker.SessionNotReadyForVotingWaitForModerator: Session not ready for Voting! Wait for moderator to start
